attributes.action: Provide adequate funding for brass bands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Brass band members have been lobbying Culture Minister Margaret Hodge over what they see as inadequate funding. 
The musicians hope the government will provide more cash, ensuring the survival of such bands. 

Barnsley East and Mexborough MP, Jeff Ennis claims that for every £1 given to brass bands, opera receives £1,113. 

Source: news.bbc.co.uk

Please sign the petition if any of your family or ancestors ever worked in a colliery, if your kids' school has a band, if you ever heard a brass band live or on film/TV (so that's probably everybody then).

Thank you - now tell your friends.
